entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Snow near the British Columbia border this afternoon. Amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 80 late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
